title: Reg Organizer 6.55 Final (preactivated) RePack (& Portable)
description:
Reg Organizer 6.55 Final (preactivated) RePack (& Portable) by D!akov

Reg Organizer - is a multipurpose program for complex service system registry operating systems Micorosft Windows XP, Vista, 7 and 8. Allows for cleaning the registry, its compression and defragmentation. Has a powerful registry editor and advanced search and replace data. With utility Reg Organizer you can preview the imported reg-files (including from Windows Explorer). In addition, allows the complete removal of the software (based on technology Full Uninstall Ã¢â€žÂ¢), tidying all the "tails" which remain in the system for normal deletion.

Key features:

Registry Editor to view and edit the registry to perform various operations c keys and registry values, exporting and importing the key values Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹etc.
Search and replace in the registry - allows you to find all keys related to a certain application and delete them if necessary (one of the options for manual cleaning registry). This is useful, for example, when an application does not uninstall the program, and after removing it "manually" in the registry are unnecessary entries, which can lead to abnormal functioning of other applications. At the same time, Reg Organizer provides the deepest search and can often find even those keys associated with the application, which are not found in other similar programs ..
Registry file editor designed to edit keys and values, add and delete data contained in the. Reg-files. A very useful tool for converting software settings from one computer to another. Unlike built-in Registry Editor allows you to create teams reg-files that may contain various branches of the registry keys.
Preview of the registry files (*. Reg) before adding their contents will assess the data even before the import. When you view the imported reg-file contents as a tree structure in the program Reg Organizer, which allows to visualize all keys that will be imported into the registry.
Tracking the registry keys will monitor the actions of any program and learn in detail about all the changes that it makes to the registry.
Completely remove programs in Reg Orgnazer help smooth out all the tails of programs (cleaning the registry and file system after uninstalling programs) to prevent cluttering the registry and the file system, which is very useful, because not all programs are removed for a working files and recording settings in the registry. Feature is implemented based on the technology Full Uninstall Ã¢â€žÂ¢, which is also used in the program Soft Organizer.
Tweaks in Reg Organizer will help you configure a job Windows "for themselves."
Startup programs can also be tracked using Reg Organizer. So you can control the programs used by the system and free up valuable resources for other purposes.
Registry Cleaning - Reg Organizer find yourself all the unnecessary and erroneous entries in the system registry of your Windows, as well as fix them.
Optimize Registry - Reg Organizer will compress files, system registry and defragment them.

Platform : Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 8.1
Language : English, Russian
